name: My Dear Dolly
description:
In My Dear Dolly you play as a lost ghost that has possessed a small doll. 

The ghost noticed it couldn't pass through daylight anymore, and has to use the doll as it's vessel.

Solve a puzzle where you need to combine the powers of both parties to progress through the attic.

Credits: Alexander Tallgren, Markus Lindstedt, Robin Halttunen, Rasmus Rask
